text: It would be cool to be able to group “Theme Modules” further, into their own folders or categories in the page editor. I think it would make it easier to see which modules belong where. Sometimes naming conventions aren’t clear enough, no matter how hard you try.
Dan, with themes, any modules that are part of the theme do show up in the page editor grouped together as Theme Modules.

Anybody working with Themes around multiple domains? If using a Theme with with multiple domains, there's not a way to set theme fields based on the domain. So you wind up creating multiple Themes, each with their own set of similar modules and templates.
Dan, I agree. If you want to create a shared module folder or using marketplace modules everything outside the theme module group shows up under all modules. Some order to that would be nice.
